title: Zn-substituted heteropoly acids as efficient catalysts for the addition–esterification of 1-hexene
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01720F, Paper
Xiaoyan Xue, Yan Sun, Qiwen Sun, Weiren Bao, Zongsen Zhang, Liping Chang, Jiancheng Wang, Kechang Xie
Sec-hexyl acetate was synthesized by the addition–esterification of 1-hexene using Zn-substituted germanium tungstic acid and silicotungstic acid catalysts.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
